description: Schema for Interra site config object
title: Interra Catalog Site Config

prodUrl.title: Production URL
prodUrl.description: A URL for the production instance.

testUrl.title: Test URL
testUrl.description: A URL for the test instance.

devdUrl.title: Development URL
devdUrl.description: A URL for the development instance. In most cases use http://localhost:3000

type.title: Search backend
type.descprition: The type of search the site should use.

fields.title: Fields
fields.descprition: List of fields to include in the search index. Only these fields are part of the search.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The endpoint used for the search. For use with Algolia and ElasticSearch

private.title: Private settings
private.description: Private settings that should not be exported publicly with the rest of the config. Used for aws or other credentials.

aws.title: AWS settings
aws.description: Object to hold AWS settings such as secret key and access id

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The endpoint used to push to docs to. Can be the same as the public search endpoint though would recommend using API Gateway.

front-page-icon-collection.description: The collection to be used for front page icons
front-page-icon-collection.Title: Front page icon collection

front-page-icons.description: The icons to be used for front page icons
front-page-icons.Title: Front page icons
